line.originaltext: 1 (1 inch) piece peeled fresh ginger, diced
Place the jerk seasoning, oil, garlic, ginger, green onions, and jalapeno slices in a blender, and blend until thick and smooth.
Place the jerk seasoning, oil, garlic, ginger, green onions, and jalapeno slices in a blender, and blend until thick and smooth.
line.annotation: combine({ing132, ing133, ing134, ing135, ing136, ing137}, ing139, "mixture", "in blender")

line.originaltext: Place the jerk seasoning, oil, garlic, ginger, green onions, and jalapeno slices in a blender, and blend until thick and smooth.
Place the jerk seasoning, oil, garlic, ginger, green onions, and jalapeno slices in a blender, and blend until thick and smooth.
Dunk wings in the mixture, and arrange in single layer on baking sheets.
Dunk wings in the mixture, and arrange in single layer on baking sheets.
line.annotation: combine({ing138, ing140}, ing141, "covered wings", "dunk in mixture")

line.originaltext: Dunk wings in the mixture, and arrange in single layer on baking sheets.
Cover with aluminum foil, and refrigerate 8 hours, or overnight.
line.annotation: leave(ing141,"cover with aluminum foil, refrigerate for 8 hours")

line.originaltext: Preheat oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C).
Preheat oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C).
Bake wings 2 hours in the preheated oven.
